member.summary: PUT /v1.0/buckets - Create a new bucket. Non-global-admin users have their tenant ID automatically prefixed to the bucket name.

member.summary: GET /v1.0/buckets - List buckets. Non-global-admin users only see buckets prefixed with their tenant ID.

member.summary: GET /v1.0/buckets/{name} - Get a specific bucket by name. Non-global-admin users can only access buckets prefixed with their tenant ID.

member.summary: DELETE /v1.0/buckets/{name} - Delete a bucket by name. Non-global-admin users can only delete buckets prefixed with their tenant ID.

member.summary: HEAD /v1.0/buckets/{name} - Check bucket existence. Non-global-admin users can only check buckets prefixed with their tenant ID.

member.summary: PUT /v1.0/buckets/{name}/objects - Create an empty object (directory marker). Query param: key (required).

member.summary: POST /v1.0/buckets/{name}/objects/upload - Upload a file. Query param: key (required).

member.name: M:AssistantHub.Server.Handlers.HandlerBase.RequireGlobalAdmin(WatsonWebserver.Core.HttpContextBase)
member.summary: Require global admin. Returns AuthContext or null (caller should send 403).
member.returns: AuthContext if global admin, null otherwise.

member.summary: Require global admin or tenant admin. Returns AuthContext or null.

member.summary: Validate that the caller can access the given tenant. Global admins can access any tenant. Non-global-admins can only access their own.

member.summary: Enforce that a loaded record belongs to the caller's tenant. Global admins bypass this check.

member.name: M:AssistantHub.Server.Handlers.InferenceHandler.ResolveInferenceServiceAsync(WatsonWebserver.Core.HttpContextBase)
member.summary: Resolve the inference service to use. If an assistantId query parameter is present, loads the assistant's settings and creates a temporary InferenceService targeting that assistant's endpoint. Otherwise returns the global Inference service.
member.returns: InferenceService instance, or null if an error response was sent.

member.name: T:AssistantHub.Server.Services.EndpointHealthCheckService
member.summary: Background service that performs periodic health checks on both embedding and completion endpoints. Health state is tracked entirely in RAM and not persisted. Endpoint config is fetched from Partio via HTTP; this service parses JSON responses directly.

member.name: M:AssistantHub.Server.Services.EndpointHealthCheckService.#ctor(AssistantHub.Core.Settings.AssistantHubSettings,SyslogLogging.LoggingModule)
member.summary: Initialize a new EndpointHealthCheckService.

member.name: M:AssistantHub.Server.Services.EndpointHealthCheckService.StartAsync
member.summary: Start health checks for all enabled and active endpoints by enumerating from Partio.

member.name: M:AssistantHub.Server.Services.EndpointHealthCheckService.EnumerateAndStartAsync(System.String)
member.summary: Enumerate endpoints of a given type from Partio and start health checks.

member.name: M:AssistantHub.Server.Services.EndpointHealthCheckService.OnEndpointCreated(System.String)
member.summary: Called when a new endpoint is created. Parse the Partio response JSON and start monitoring if applicable.

member.name: M:AssistantHub.Server.Services.EndpointHealthCheckService.OnEndpointUpdated(System.String)
member.summary: Called when an endpoint is updated. Parse the Partio response JSON, stop existing loop, and restart if applicable.

member.name: M:AssistantHub.Server.Services.EndpointHealthCheckService.OnEndpointDeleted(System.String)
member.summary: Called when an endpoint is deleted. Stop the loop and remove state.

member.name: M:AssistantHub.Server.Services.EndpointHealthCheckService.GetHealthState(System.String)
member.summary: Get the health state for a specific endpoint. Returns null if no state exists.

member.name: M:AssistantHub.Server.Services.EndpointHealthCheckService.GetAllHealthStates(System.String)
member.summary: Get health states for all monitored endpoints, optionally filtered by tenant.

member.name: M:AssistantHub.Server.Services.EndpointHealthCheckService.IsHealthy(System.String)
member.summary: Returns true if the endpoint is healthy or if no health state exists (health check not enabled).

member.name: M:AssistantHub.Server.Services.EndpointHealthCheckService.ParseEndpointConfig(System.Text.Json.JsonElement)
member.summary: Parse endpoint health config fields from a JSON element (Partio response).

member.name: T:AssistantHub.Server.Services.EndpointHealthCheckService.EndpointConfig
member.summary: Internal config holder for parsed endpoint JSON.
